room_title: Escape room "The Sting" by The Panel Room Escape Games in St. Joseph (MO)
room_address: 107 South 4th Street, 2nd Floor, St Joseph, MO 64501
room_description:
You and your cohorts have been contracted by a long-forgotten musician. He is in need of your help to stealthily sneak into his once beloved music studio and locate a prized-possession that will get him back on his feet.
The studio has multiple layers of high-tech security, preventing you from making it an easy getaway. On top of that, someone tipped off The police about your plans. To ensure you donâ€™t get caught, you must unlock each level, return what is owed to the musician, and escape within 60 minutes before getting caught.
